summary: Page 45 (book page 65/81) continues Chapter 5. Starts with continuation fragment from section yud, then sections yud-aleph through tet-zayin. Contains grouping header 'Yisurim'. Structure is well captured overall. The page_side is marked 'left' but the Hebrew page number is סה which would typically be a right page - however this may be correct depending on binding.

issues.description: The continuation fragment text 'מה שהחסיר לנו הקב"ה' is very short. Looking at the image, the continuation text at the top of the right column appears to say something like 'מה שהתיר לנו הקב"ה' (what Hashem permitted us). The word 'החסיר' vs 'התיר' needs verification.
OCR has 'למאור זרע בירך' at the start. The image shows this appears to be a book title reference 'למאור'. Also 'בירך' may be part of a source reference rather than body text.
OCR has 'שת קבל שכר על שתיקתו' but image shows 'שתק קבל שכר על שתיקתו' - the word should be 'שתק' (he was silent), not 'שת'.
issues.original_text: וברש"י שת קבל שכר על שתיקתו
